identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Neo-Gov' aesthetic that bridges formal authority with modern digital fluidity. No boring government portals.
principles: Fusion: Swiss Grid meets Indian Heritage
Content: Every pixel serves the legal query
Contrast: Deep Navy vs. Vibrant Saffron

headings.usage: All H1-H3 headings. Use font-black for H1, font-bold for H2.

body.usage: All paragraphs, inputs, and UI elements.

mono.usage: Case numbers, FIR IDs, Legal citations.

primary.name: Supreme Navy
primary.usage: Primary buttons, Footer, Header backgrounds, Text-High-Contrast

secondary.name: Digital Saffron
secondary.usage: Call to Actions (Submit), Highlights, Active States

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay on the Navy backgrounds to avoid 'flatness'.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md px-8 py-6 font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border-2 border-slate-200 hover:border-slate-900 rounded-md px-8 py-6 font-bold transition-all
buttons.accent: bg-orange-500 text-white hover:bg-orange-600 rounded-md px-8 py-6 font-bold shadow-orange-500/20 shadow-lg

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all p-6 or p-8

inputs.style: h-12 bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:border-slate-900 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-slate-900 rounded-md transition-all

layout_strategies.home_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 p-4 md:p-12

hero_background.description: Indian Supreme Court Building - Use with heavy dark overlay for Hero Section

legal_context.description: Gavel and Books - Use for 'Legal Resources' or 'About' section

professional.description: Professional Lawyer/Official - Use for 'Internship Portal' or 'Expert Advice'

emblem_placeholder.description: National Emblem (Use SVG if possible, else this URL)

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text on Navy backgrounds is Pure White (#FFFFFF). Text on Saffron must be Black or Dark Navy.
accessibility.aria: All icon-only buttons (like Mic) must have aria-label.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'Merriweather' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts.
2. THEME: Update tailwind.config.js to use the 'Digital Ashoka' palette. Override the default 'radius' to 0.5rem.
3. NAVBAR: Create a sticky navbar with 'Glassmorphism' (backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80). Include the Language Toggle prominently.
4. HOME: Implement the 'Tetris Grid'. Hero section must use the Supreme Court image with a gradient overlay (slate-900/90 to slate-900/40).
5. VOICE INPUT: Create a 'VoiceRecorder' component. Use a large, pulsing FAB (Floating Action Button) style for the microphone.
6. FORMS: Do not use long scrolling forms. Break the 'Submit Legal Query' into 3 steps: Personal Details -> Case Description -> Voice/Evidence Upload.
7. RESPONSE PAGE: Style this like a formal legal document. Use a 'Paper' texture background (subtle noise) and Serif fonts for the content.
8. INTERNSHIP PORTAL: Use a dense 'Control Room' grid. Data tables should be clean with zebra striping (odd: bg-slate-50).
9. FOOTER: Massive 'Saffron' top border (border-t-4 border-orange-500). Dark Navy background.
10. TESTING: Add data-testid to all inputs and buttons.

do_not: Do not use default Shadcn 'zinc' colors. Use Slate (Blue-Grey).
Do not use gradients for text.
Do not center text in the 'Response' page; keep it left-aligned for readability.
must_do: Use 'lucide-react' icons: Scale, Gavel, Mic, FileText, User, Globe.
Ensure the 'Ashoka Chakra' Blue (#0f172a) is the dominant brand color.
